00044 template <class BaseClass, class FeatureInterface>
00045 void TFeaturesContainerWrap<BaseClass, FeatureInterface>::ResetFeatures()
00046 {
00047        istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(this);
00048 
00049        m_featuresList.Reset();
00050 }

00053 template <class BaseClass, class FeatureInterface>
00054 bool TFeaturesContainerWrap<BaseClass, FeatureInterface>::AddFeature(const iipr::IFeature* featurePtr, bool* /*isFullPtr*/)
00055 {
00056        if (featurePtr != NULL && IsFeatureAccepted(featurePtr)){
00057               istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(this);
00058 
00059               m_featuresList.PushBack(const_cast<iipr::IFeature*>(featurePtr));
00060               
00061               return true;
00062        }
00063 
00064        return false;
00065 }

00070 template <class BaseClass, class FeatureInterface>
00071 typename iipr::IFeaturesContainer::Features TFeaturesContainerWrap<BaseClass, FeatureInterface>::GetFeatures() const
00072 {
00073        iipr::IFeaturesContainer::Features featuresList;
00074        
00075        for (int index = 0; index < m_featuresList.GetCount(); index++){
00076               featuresList.push_back(m_featuresList.GetAt(index));
00077        }
00078 
00079        return featuresList;
00080 }

00087 {
00088        I_ASSERT(featurePtr != NULL);
00089
